channel.title: CVE Feed for Antenna House -- AntennaHouse
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Antenna House -- AntennaHouse

item.title: CVE-2016-8384|2024-09-16T18:09:08.264Z -- antenna%20house -- antennahouse
item.description: An exploitable heap corruption vulnerability exists in the DHFSummary functionality of AntennaHouse DMC HTMLFilter.

item.title: CVE-2016-8383|2024-09-16T17:14:07.603Z -- antenna%20house -- antennahouse
item.description: An exploitable heap corruption vulnerability exists in the Doc_GetFontTable functionality of AntennaHouse DMC HTMLFilter. A specially crafted doc file can cause a heap corruption resulting in arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send/provide malicious doc file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2016-8382|2024-09-16T19:00:24.562Z -- antenna%20house -- antennahouse
item.description: An exploitable heap corruption vulnerability exists in the Doc_SetSummary functionality of AntennaHouse DMC HTMLFilter. A specially crafted doc file can cause a heap corruption resulting in arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send a malicious doc file to trigger this vulnerability.
